title: buttons are not displayed on ie8
body:
### expected behaviour
buttons should be displayed

### actual behaviour
please, have a look at the image attached. buttons are not displayed on ie8

### steps to reproduce
1. access to oc with ie8

### server configuration
"version":"5.0.0","versionstring":"5.0", using owncloud-daily-stable5.tar.bz2
open suse 12.2


### client configuration
browser: ie8


### logs

#### web browser console

```
script1012: expected '/' 
core.js?cee631121c2ec9232f3a2f028ad5c89b, line 709 character 471
script5007: unable to get value of the property 'ajaxtransport': object is null or undefined 
jquery.iframe-transport.js?cee631121c2ec9232f3a2f028ad5c89b, line 37 character 5
script5007: unable to get value of the property 'support': object is null or undefined 
jquery.fileupload.js?cee631121c2ec9232f3a2f028ad5c89b, line 33 character 5
script5009: 'jquery' is undefined 
jquery-visibility.js?cee631121c2ec9232f3a2f028ad5c89b, line 2 character 1
script5007: the value of the property '$' is null or undefined, not a function object 
filelist.js?cee631121c2ec9232f3a2f028ad5c89b, line 353 character 1
script5007: the value of the property '$' is null or undefined, not a function object 
fileactions.js?cee631121c2ec9232f3a2f028ad5c89b, line 152 character 1
script5007: the value of the property '$' is null or undefined, not a function object 
files.js?cee631121c2ec9232f3a2f028ad5c89b, line 86 character 1
```
